function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of online survey questionnaire and video conferencing for data collection","Impact":"Potential bias and inaccuracy in data due to limited access to respondents, technical issues, and lack of control over data collection environment","Mitigation":"Use of multiple data collection methods, validation of data through different sources, and quality control measures for online surveys and interviews","Technologies":"Data validation software, video conferencing platforms with recording capabilities, online survey tools with quality control features","People":"Researchers, respondents, construction industry professionals","Owner":"Research team, data collection team"},{"Description":"Sampling technique for population selection","Impact":"Risk of selection bias, lack of representativeness, and potential for erroneous generalization of findings","Mitigation":"Random sampling, stratified sampling, and careful selection of sample size to ensure representation of population characteristics","Technologies":"Statistical software for sampling, randomization tools, and data analysis software for validation of findings","People":"Researchers, study participants, construction industry professionals","Owner":"Research team, data analysis team"},{"Description":"Use of quantitative research design for data collection","Impact":"Potential oversimplification of complex phenomena, inability to capture qualitative insights, and limited understanding of human behavior and experiences","Mitigation":"Integration of qualitative research methods, triangulation of data from different sources, and inclusion of open-ended questions in surveys and interviews","Technologies":"Qualitative analysis software, cross-validation tools, and interview transcription tools","People":"Researchers, study participants, construction industry professionals","Owner":"Research team, qualitative research team"}]}
